short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block and manage access to specific websites with ease. Add sites to a block list and prevent distractions with a simple interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage and block access to distracting websites with Website Blocker. Whether you're trying to boost productivity, reduce screen time, or simply avoid certain sites, this extension provides a simple and effective way to stay focused.
